channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Joel Klatt previewed the Texas A&M Aggies vs. the Texas Longhorns. He analyzed if Texas A&M could beat Texas and secure a spot in the SEC Championship...

item.title: St. John's Struggles Continue as the Red Storm Blow Lead in Loss to Auburn
item.description: St. John's loses its third game to a top-25 opponent this season after blowing a second-half lead to Auburn.

item.title: No. 2 South Carolina Tops Duke, Advances to Face Texas in Players Era Championship
item.description: No. 2 South Carolina beat Duke, 83-66, to remain undefeated and advance to the Players Era Championship, where the Gamecocks will face Texas.

item.title: 2025 NFL Thanksgiving Games: Best Turkey Day Memory For All 6 Teams Since 2000
item.description: These are the best Thanksgiving memories of the century for the six teams playing on Thursday in 2025.

item.title: Center Ragnow ends retirement to return to Lions
item.description: Frank Ragnow, a four-time Pro Bowler for the Lions, is ending his five-month retirement and returning to play for Detroit.

item.title: Sources: Kelly officially fired by LSU without cause
item.description: The posturing over Brian Kelly's $54 million buyout from LSU is over, sources told ESPN, as the school sent him a letter Wednesday saying it is offici...

item.title: NBA Cup takeaways: Everything to know before Friday's final night of group play
item.description: The 2025 NBA Cup continues as group play wraps up. Here's everything you need to know about the third annual in-season tournament.

item.title: Faulk expected to land Southern job, sources say
item.description: Former NFL star and current Colorado RBs coach Marshall Faulk is expected to become head coach at Southern University, sources confirmed to ESPN.

item.title: Sources: Jays, Cease reach 7-year, $210M deal
